Package core

Class ReflectionService

java.lang.Object
core.ReflectionService
public class ReflectionService
extends java.lang.Object
Creates instances of classes using their constructor and arguments provided by the caller.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    ReflectionService()

  • Method Details

    • loadClass

      public java.lang.Object loadClass​(java.lang.String classPath, java.lang.String interfacePath) throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, InvalidFormatException
      Instantiate a class with a no-args constructor.
      Parameters:
      classPath - the path and name of the class to lead relative to the root of the project.
      interfacePath - the path and name of the interface that the class is to implement.
      Returns:
      an instance of the loaded class.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - when the constructor can't be found.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the class or interface doesn't exist.
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - when the class or interface are in a read protected space.
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - when the class or interface cannot be invoked.
      java.lang.InstantiationException - when an object of the class cannot be instantiated.
      InvalidFormatException - when the classPath or interfacePath is malformed.

    • loadClass

      public java.lang.Object loadClass​(java.lang.String classPath, java.lang.String interfacePath, java.lang.Class<?>[] initArgsClasses, java.lang.Object[] constructorArgs) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException, InvalidFormatException
      Instantiate a class with a constructor that takes arguments. Example inputs: ("java.awt.Rectangle", "java.io.Serializable", new Class[] {int.class, int.class}, new Object[] {5, 10})
      Parameters:
      classPath - the path and name of the class to lead relative to the root of the project.
      interfacePath - the path and name of the interface that the class is to implement.
      initArgsClasses - the classes array that the constructor takes.
      constructorArgs - an array of object parameters that a loaded class may need passed into it's constructor.
      Returns:
      an instance of the loaded class to be type casted by the caller.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - when the constructor can't be found.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the class or interface doesn't exist.
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - when the class or interface are in a read protected space.
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - when the class or interface cannot be invoked.
      java.lang.InstantiationException - when an object of the class cannot be instantiated.
      InvalidFormatException - when the classPath or interfacePath is malformed.

    • searchPackage

      public java.lang.Object[] searchPackage​(java.lang.String packageName, java.lang.String interfacePath) throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.io.IOException, java.net.URISyntaxException, InvalidFormatException
      instantiates an object from each file in a package that matches a specified interface
      Parameters:
      packageName - the name of the package to instantiate objects from
      interfacePath - the path and name of the interface which classes must implement to be instantiated
      Returns:
      a list of objects from the specified package that implement the specified interface
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      java.io.IOException
      java.net.URISyntaxException
      InvalidFormatException

    • retrieveConfigSetter

      public java.lang.reflect.Method retrieveConfigSetter​(Config c, java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.String fieldName) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      attempt to retrieve the setter for a field in the config file, it it exists
      Parameters:
      c - the config file to get the setter from
      fieldName - the name of the field that we want to find a setter for
      Returns:
      a method for setting the passed fieldName to a new value
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
